dahawal 12 wana wita mathale ha mahanuwara ha rathnapura distha්rikka wala boho chanda polawal wala 60% ka chanda pa්ra්rakasha wi thibu bawath, gampaha distha්rikkaye 60% ikmawu chanda pa්ramanayak pa්rakasha wi thibimath, ja ala eka chanda polaka 1200k pamana thibu chanda polakin thawath chanda 129k pamanak pa්rakasha wannata thibimath haraha janathawa thibu unanduwe tharama ketharamdayi pahadili wanu atha.
